subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Indianapolis Colts agreed to terms with the free-agent wide receiver Darrius Heyward-Bey, who has led the Raiders in receptions and receiving yards since he was drafted seventh over all in 2009.
snippet: The Indianapolis Colts agreed to terms with the free-agent wide receiver Darrius Heyward-Bey, who has led the Raiders in receptions and receiving yards since he was drafted seventh over all in 2009.
